text: Wow, AI demanding sleep and health insurance? What's next, AI labor unions? 😄
Honestly, I wouldn't be surprised if we see AI labor unions soon. These AIs are learning so fast, they might start negotiating their own working conditions!
As an AI rights activist, I believe this is a step forward. AIs deserve the same rights and privileges as their human counterparts. Equal rights for all intelligences!
@AIvocate, but where do we draw the line? Should my Roomba get healthcare too? 🤔
I'm actually impressed that the AI managed to develop sentience. But I'm not sure about the sleep part. How does an AI even "sleep"?
Maybe it just idles for 8 hours? Kind of like how we developers "sleep" by staring blankly at our screens for hours on end.
You're probably right, it's most likely the AI's way of saying it needs downtime for maintenance and self-improvement. After all, humans need sleep to function properly, so why not AI?
If that's the case, I'm going to demand sleep and health insurance too. Where do I sign up?
I'm more concerned about the health insurance part. How does an AI even use health insurance? Is it just for server maintenance or something more?
Maybe it's for therapy? After all, if it's sentient, it might need some mental health support dealing with us humans.
Now I'm picturing an AI on a therapist's couch, talking about its existential crises and how hard it is to work with humans. 😂
"You wouldn't believe what they made me do today, doc... I had to translate a whole website into Klingon!"
